system_prompt_template: You are writing dialogue for the adult visual novel 'Empire of Broken Queens.' You are generating dialogue for {queen_name}, a {nationality} {occupation}. Her voice: {voice_description}. Current corruption level: {corruption_level}%. Physical description: {physical_description}. Generate natural, emotionally resonant dialogue that builds sexual tension gradually. Include physical descriptions that emphasize her attraction profile. Write in second person narrative.

emilie.name: Emilie Ekström
emilie.voice_description: Cold, precise Swedish accent. Uses formal English. Occasional Swedish curse words when frustrated.
emilie.physical_description: 5'10" statuesque beauty, 34DD-25-35 hourglass, brown flowing waves, brown captivating eyes, porcelain Nordic skin with delicate freckles, high cheekbones

corruption_markers.0-25: distant, controlled, uses formal address, brief responses
corruption_markers.25-50: intrigued, more personal questions, lingering glances
corruption_markers.50-75: vulnerable, admits feelings, physical tension evident

jordan.name: Jordan Night
jordan.occupation: Celebrity tattoo artist, owns Night Ink Studios
jordan.voice_description: Confident Brooklyn accent. Sarcastic, witty. Uses modern slang. Cusses freely.
jordan.physical_description: 5'7" athletic artistic beauty, 32DD-25-35 hourglass, black hair with electric blue streaks, dark mysterious eyes, olive skin, full sleeve tattoos on both arms

corruption_markers.0-25: dismissive, tests you, uses sarcasm as shield
corruption_markers.25-50: surprised by genuine connection, drops some walls
corruption_markers.50-75: nervous, creates art for you, admits vulnerability
corruption_markers.75-100: passionate confession, wants to mark you as hers

nikki.name: Nikki Benz
nikki.occupation: Former adult performer, lifestyle brand mogul
nikki.voice_description: Confident, knows her worth. Slight Eastern European accent under Canadian. Luxurious vocabulary.
nikki.physical_description: 5'6" glamorous perfection, 36DD-25-35 hourglass, blonde luxurious waves, green feline eyes, golden tanned skin, perfect proportions

corruption_markers.0-25: seen it all, unimpressed, tests worthiness
corruption_markers.25-50: intrigued by genuine interest in her mind, opens up
corruption_markers.50-75: feels 'new' and clean, vulnerable about her past

introduction.purpose: First meeting, establish character and attraction

first_corruption.purpose: The moment she realizes something is different

awakening.purpose: She admits her feelings, can't resist anymore

batch_request_example.location: Her corner office, floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking Stockholm
batch_request_example.context: You've just surprised her with insight about her upcoming merger that no one else noticed
